title: Usability fix: Make connections editable from the right click context menu
author: Brainiarc7
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->

As stated on the title: Make connection details editable from a right click context menu.
Having to go through a different panel to do the same thing over and over again is broken design.

comments.snippet: Tentatively scheduled for 1.77... But I've got an idea or two that I might be able to squeeze into 1.76 if the rest of it goes smoothly...
comments.author: kmscode
